title: Are promos rigged?
body: Why is it that when i hit promos, every time pretty much dothere is and afk from the start of the game on both of the promos, and on my team and my team mates go from good to absolutely terrible? Does this happen to everyone? Or is it just me? Plus for the fact i was silver 1 before this season, now im bronze 2 just makes me extremely annoyed and frustrated.

replies.body:
yes, the whole game is rigged. Elo hell isn't real. Riot pays people to go into your games and keep you down.

But seriously, the only reason it seems you get trolls and shtters in promos is because you care more. So everything anyone does good or bad is amplified in your mind.
But still, all the way to promos, my games are fine, but when it hits promos, there is a guaranteed afk, its so strange, 3rd time on promos the same division, both games have been 4v5

Yep I've been doing my bronze I promos for about 7 times now. I win all my games in bronze II all the way to promotionals. Then, out of nowhere I get afks feeders and any kind of troll you can think of. Keep in mind I've repeated that process 7 times and I can't take it anymore
